comment: Kamala Harris officially ended her campaign today , which means that all of the candidates who currently qualify for the December Democratic debate are white ( Sanders , Warren , Biden , Buttigieg , Klobuchar , and Steyer ) . White supremacy is not just a Fox News problem , folks .
